Summary: Huge blazing dripping reddish orange burning fireball.
divs: Sighting DetailsTHE LARGE REDISH ORANGE FIREBALL ROSE UP VERY SLOWLY ABOVE A MOUNTAIN RIDGE TO THE WEST AS I DROVE SOUTHWARD TOWARD LAS VEGAS TO THE EAST OF DEATH VALLEY IN NEVADA. THE FIREBALL APPEARED TO BE DRIPPING LIQUID FIRE. THE FIREBALL SEEMED TO MOVE SOUTHWARD WITH ME FOR ABOUT FIVE MINUTES AND THEN SLOWLY DECENDED BACK DOWN BEHIND THE HUGE MOUNTAIN TOP. I HEARD ABOUT A WEEK LATER THAT PEOPLE HAVE SEEN THE LARGE FIREBALL AROUND THE AREA 51 BASE, AND THAT IT MIGHT BE USED TO DEFLECT HEAD SEEKING MISSILES IF THEY WERE LAUNCHED TOWARD THE AIR FORCES BASE NEAR LAS VEGAS, BUT I DON'T KNOW FOR SURE. THE OBJECT MOVED SLOWLY AND SILENTLY. I HAD NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE IT BEFORE. I DO NOT KNOW WHAT IT WAS.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 18th 1981
